summary: 2012 FORD FOCUS.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO VEHICLE HEADLIGHTS WILL NOT SWITCH TO BRIGHT.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED THE HEADLIGHTS REMAINED ON DIM AND SHE WAS UNABLE TO SWITCH THEM OFF AND THEY WOULD COME ON, WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER REPEATEDLY FOR THE DEFECT. ON THE LAST OCCASIONS, THE VEHICLE FUNCTIONED NORMALLY FOR A FEW DAYS, BUT RETURNED TO ITS ORIGINAL PROBLEM WITHIN A FEW DAYS. ADDITIONALLY, THERE WERE TWO INCIDENTS, WHERE THE HEADLIGHTS SIMPLY CEASED TO WORK WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT. *JB
